privacy.question: Purpose of Policy Victory Internship portal is committed to protecting your privacy and the information that you provide to us or that we collect. This policy discusses the type of information we collect, how we use it, whether we share it with others, what you can do to limit our use of it and how you can correct the information or have it deleted. Please read this policy carefully before using our website. This policy applies to Victory Internship portal only and not to any other persons, organizations or entities linked to or included on the website. This policy was developed using the laws and regulations of the India as a guide. The laws and regulations of your country regarding privacy may be different if you reside outside of the India. For that reason, we suggest that you check them. After doing so, you may decide not to provide personal information. However, if you do decide to continue to visit or use our website, it is expressly understood that you agree to be bound by the provisions of this privacy policy.

What Information Do We Collect? You may visit and use Victory Internship Portal at any time that the website is operational. You are welcome to visit our site anonymously; the submission of personal information is not required to use the general features of the website. However, you may choose to submit personal information in order to view the internships and apply for any internships. In those instances, you may be asked to enter your name, e-mail address, mailing address, phone number. That data will be collected and stored to allow us to appropriately communicate with you to provide the documentation as requested.

Do We Use Cookies? Yes, we collect information about you whenever you visit our website through using cookies. Cookies are small electronic identifiers, which we attach to your computerâ€™s hard drive through your web browser (if you allow), that enable us to recognize you and remember certain information. We use cookies to help us compile aggregate data about site traffic and interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future. The cookie does not collect personal information, nor does it combine the information obtained with personal information. Once you leave our website, the cookie disengages. It does not track where you go on the Internet unless you are on our website. Some of the third parties linked to or included on our website may use cookies; we have no control over their usage.

What Do We Use Your Information For? Any of the information we collect from you may be used in one of the following ways: To effectively respond to your service requests and support needs. To send periodic e-mails
Changes to our Privacy Policy If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page. This policy was last modified on August 4, 2014.
Your Consent By using Victory Internship Portal, you consent to our privacy policy.
